name: NFT Global Platform
description: The goal of NFT Global Platform is to make NFTs more accessible for the mainstream market and resolve the major problems within the NFT industry. The company is based in Switzerland and will provide an innovative platform built on the Binance Network to give artists, collectors, and traders with no crypto experience the possibility of being profitable with NFTs. We are currently building the first NFT Artist Management Platform and a Marketplace with never-seen functionalities in the NFT Space. This includes NFT Trading Bots, copy trading, recommendations from an algorithm based on more than 20 significant metrics, and much more.
